structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Administrative regulations on adult day health care.

text.section: The cabinet shall, on or before August 1, 2000, promulgate administrative regulations addressing the scope of services for licensed adult day health care programs.
The cabinet shall, on or prior to December 1, 2000, study and promulgate administrative regulations regarding the way case management for adult day health care patients is administered.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
